description:
A hunter outwits a giant ogre called an oni.  Two sons find a statue of one of the buddhas while trying to catch fish for their sick mother.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kariudo to Oni / Asakusa Sanja Matsuri
The Hunter and the Oni / The Three Shrine Festival of Asakusa
狩人と鬼 / 浅草・三社祭
